title: Why does every goddamn Vayne think they're GosuLift reincarnated in a Bronze/Silver player..........

replies.body: I laughed so hard when I read this xD

inb4 vayne had zero peel from her team, and just kept getting jumped on and deleted out of every team fight. So she decided she was more useful split pushing and pulling multiple enemies with her to give her team a 4v3 siege opportunity.

I've NEVER met a "kitey control Mage" in bronze/silver that would use their cc to peel rather than kill

Except she never joined the team fight to begin with. I value peel very much so, and I'm not stupid I know that the Vayne will have a much easier time killing the Mundo than I will, so naturally it's better to keep her alive over me, but how do I peel for her when she's not around?
Yeah but I find that MORE often than not, Riven players actually do end up stomping

Well watching professional or successful league players helps to learn how to play the game imho. Players like Gosu/Faker/DoubleLift and the like who can pull of some impressive combos and plays. If these plays are successful for them, why not try to replicate them? Players who try to do unfamiliar mechanics will sometimes perform poorly, so what? If you mean that they're cocky, well that's not because they're playing Vayne or Zed or whoever, it's because they enjoy showing off ^_^

But if they want to practice fancy plays it's not so polite to do so in ranked. They should be playing with the mechanics in norms and then taking it into ranked. 

That said, I think OP is referring to the specific brand of player that thinks they're real hot stuff and are determined to let you know and are generally just no fun to interact with in any way and are almost always deserving of reports.
That's the only reason they play that champ.

rofl like last game i played, there was a mundo, nasus, ryze and blitzcrank on the enemy team, and we had the best tank killing adc in Vayne and also quite a good kite-y tank killing control mage in me playing anivia and this vayne just splitpushed ALL game and took every chance she got to solo multiple enemies and just failed every time
